title: Dimensity Series Smartphone Technology Visuals
description: Social campaign visuals highlighting Dimensity's core innovations, including HyperEngine gaming, MFRC frame optimization, AI acceleration, intelligent power efficiency, and next-generation 5G connectivity. Designed to translate deep silicon performance into bold, graphical visualisation.

title: Dimensity Automotive Platform Visuals
description: High-impact social visuals developed to communicate MediaTek's automotive platform capabilities, translating in-vehicle AI, cockpit intelligence, and connected driving systems into immersive, futuristic compositions optimized for digital engagement.

title: MediaTek Filogic Home Connectivity
description: Platform-driven social assets developed to showcase MediaTek Filogic's Wi-Fi and connectivity solutions, simplifying advanced networking technologies into accessible, lifestyle-oriented visuals for home and IoT ecosystems.

title: MediaTek Pentonic Smart TV & Entertainment
description: Social campaign visuals highlighting MediaTek Pentonic's smart TV capabilities, emphasizing AI picture processing, immersive entertainment, and next-generation display performance through cinematic digital compositions.
